page.title: 05LEISURE LIFE IN DUDLEY (2)
page.content: Netherton Park-football pitches,bowling green,2 tennis courts. Grange Park-football pitches,2 bowling greens,3 tennis courts. Traditional entertainment by singers and comedians also takes place in the many public houses which are famous for "Real Ales".The "Black Country Night Out" is popular.People tour traditional local pubs and listen to local comedians such as Dolly Allan,Harry Harrison and Brian Clift. Annual events include:- Family Fortnight,"a festival of fun for all the family in central Dudley". It includes exhibitions by fire,police,ambulance services and the Army.Bands play;there are food stalls, processions,roundabouts,Punch and Judy shows and other street entertainers. Shops and markets stay open late.
